name: 邱家吉
objective: 本課程主要介紹工程應用上常使用的數學方法，透過模擬解題與詮釋，使學生理解如何運用數學工具解決工程問題。課程內容包括 (1) 矩陣及向量、(2) 向量微積分、(3) 傅立葉分析、(4) 偏微分方程式等章節，訓練同學在理論，計算及實驗間建立正確的認知及意義。
schedule:
Week 1 Power series method
Week 2 Linear algebra: matrices, vectors, determinants. (2/28 holiday)
Week 3 Inner product and vector product
Week 4 Gradient, divergence, curl
Week 5 Line integrals and surface integrals
Week 6 1st midterm exam 
Week 7 (4/4-5 holiday)
Week 8 Fourier series, arbitrary period, even and odd function
Week 9 Half-range expansions, Strum-Liouville problems
Week 10 Fourier Integral
Week 11 Fourier Transform
Week 12 2nd Midterm exam
Week 13 Basic concepts of PDEs
Week 14 Solution by separating variables
Week 15 P.D.E. of Laplace
Week 16 P.D.E. of Laplace
Week 17 P.D.E. of Laplace
Week 18 Final exam
scorePolicy: 第一次期中考 (25%)、第二次期中考 (25%)、期末考 (30%)、作業 (20%)
materials: Kreyszig, E. (2011): Advanced engineering mathematics, 10th edition.
